name: Over my dead body (Auggie3)
description:
Title: Over my dead body!
Movement: left, right, jump.
Player spawns at top left corner.
Goal of the levels is to reach place on the screen marked with color green.

After 8 seconds the player "dies", cementing itself on the level so new player can use his body to reach the goal. Every 8 seconds another "player" spawns.

Main goal is to use the least amount of "players".

Contributors:

Intro music - Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
